summary: TAKATA RECALL.  NOTHING IS HAPPENING WITH THIS RECALL, IF THEY HAVE THE PARTS TO PUT IN NEW VEHICLES THEY SHOULD BE PUTTING THEM IN VEHICLES ON THE ROAD ENDANGERING ME AND MY FAMILY'S LIVES. IF YOU STOP THEM FROM SELLING TRUCKS TILL THEY CORRECT THE RECALL IT WON'T BE ANOTHER 5 OR 10 YEARS BEFORE THEY GET TO MY TRUCK. THEY ARE JUST WAITING EVERYONE OUT AND YOU KNOW IT.
